name: convmedia
description: convmedia is a collection of GNU BASH scripts which perform various media conversion related tasks, such as audio/video transcoding and audio metatagging.

programs.name: bcddb
programs.description: A CDDB client which can query, read, and parse CDDB entries. Requires wget.

programs.name: btagger
programs.description: An audio metatagger that uses TagLib's tagreader and tagwriter commands. Requires taglib.

programs.name: burnaudiocd
programs.description: Burns the input audio files to a CD, decoding any formats to PCM format in the process. Requires wodim.

programs.name: convaudio
programs.description: A multi-threaded audio transcoding script. Requires taglib, vorbis-tools, neroAacEnc, flac, and lame. Optionally requires vorbisgain.

programs.name: convvideo
programs.description: A video transcoder that supports H264 (x264) and MPEG-4 (ffmpeg) for video, and Matroska and MPEG-4 for container formats. Requires mkvmerge and gpac.

programs.name: convcd
programs.description: A simplistic CD ripper that can do repeated ripping to try to account for drive read errors. Requires cdparanoia.
